page.title: 11A School Day
page.content: I get up at eight o'clock, have a wash and get dressed.Down stairs I watch TV.I go to school by car. At school I find my best friend and we go into the class. First we go into assembly.Then back in the classroom we do some work.When the bell goes we go out to play.When we come back in we get some work and go to a different class because Mrs Holmes goes swimming.At the next bell we go for our lunch. When the teacher blows the whistle we go back to our own room because Mrs Holmes is back.Then we do some more work .Then when the next bell goes at 3:15 we go home.I walk home with Paula Mallin. {Nicola Hale Cl.12 BJS {
